categories: Category:Cut content from Star Wars Adventure Journal

nodes.text: Seneerians were a sentient species in the galaxy. They were capable of smiling.
During the Galactic Civil War, the Liann Military Guard Commander Byeslee employed a Seneerian woman as a deputy. They once confronted the Anomid crimelord Yin Vocta, who flirted with the deputy.
A Seneerian was supposed to appear in the canceled short story "Just Business".
